g.G3588: the (sometimes to be supplied, at others omitted, in English idiom)
g.G2596: (prepositionally) down (in place or time), in varied relations (according to the case (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined)
g.G2532: and, also, even, so then, too, etc.; often used in connection (or composition) with other particles or small words
g.G3779: in this way (referring to what precedes or follows)
g.G25: to love (in a social or moral sense)
g.G1438: him- (her-, it-, them-, also (in conjunction with the personal pronoun of the other persons) my-, thy-, our-, your-) self (selves), etc.
g.G5613: which how, i.e. in that manner (very variously used, as follows)
g.G2443: compare G3588 (ὁ)); in order that (denoting the purpose or the result)
g.G5399: to frighten, i.e. (passively) to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. revere
g.G435: a man (properly as an individual male)
